text: Mike Van Sant, nicknamed "Mighty Mike", is an American drag racer. In 1971, Van Sant drove the popular Stone, Woods, and Cook Top Fuel Pinto funny car Tinkerbell.Funny Cars (retrieved 16 September 2018) He followed that with a ride in the SW&C; TF/FC Mustang Swinndler III.Funny Cars (retrieved 16 September 2018) More recently, he drove the TF/FC Mustang Invader. Burgess, Phil, National Dragster editor. "Mustang Funny Cars through the years" , written 20 April 2018, at NHRA.com (retrieved 16 September 2018) == Notes == == External links == *Funny Cars Category:Dragster drivers Category:American racing drivers Category:American sportsmen Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mike Van Sant
